attributes.action: Scrap all 'special days' such as Valentines day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I'm tired of everywhere i go on the run up to feb. 14th that everywhere i go prices are going up and everyone appears to be loved up all because of a day invented by card companies. Its messing with people's minds, the amount of girlfriends who are disappointed that i don't do something EXTRA special for valentines day. I'm sure i'm not the only one sick of this day. Single, in a relationship or Married. doesn't matter. Lets Ban this holiday and others like it.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
